definition: a row/a line/to set in order/to arrange/to line up/to eliminate/to drain/to push open/platoon/raft/classifier for lines, rows etc

sentences.english: The terminal is used in conjunction with a photographic typesetter.
sentences.chinese: 這種終端與照相排版機一起使用。

sentences.english: Proofs submitted by the printer should be carefully checked to eliminate typographical errors.
sentences.chinese: 排版工人應當仔細覈對提交的校樣，避免印刷錯誤。

sentences.english: Tested the system?s display and document layout.
sentences.chinese: 測試了系統顯示界面的排版顯示效果。

sentences.english: The textbooks for middle school students have been reset.
sentences.chinese: 中學生教科書現已重新排版。

sentences.english: Manual layout, product packaging and album design.
sentences.chinese: 產品說明書排版，產品包裝和畫冊設計。

sentences.english: Below are a few rules of thumb that will have you using typography more lucidly than ever before.
sentences.chinese: 下文中的一些規則將會幫助你更清晰的使用文字排版。

sentences.english: An overloaded function or method will have several signatures that will generally be typeset together.
sentences.chinese: 一個重載函數或方法有多個簽名，通常會排版在一起。

sentences.english: Keimer was not bad at composing, or at writing .
sentences.chinese: 凱默的排版技術和寫作技巧並不壞。

sentences.english: Phototypesetting equipment could also reduce costs in other areas.
sentences.chinese: 照相排版設備也可以在其他的區域中減少費用。

sentences.english: Preserve your font and paragraph editing with Format Printing.
sentences.chinese: 依照你的排版和字體打印出成稿。

sentences.english: A circular grid in a phototypesetting machine.
sentences.chinese: 照相排版機的圓盤字模板。

sentences.english: According to the paper sample, plan how to cut and how to reduce waste of cutting.
sentences.chinese: 根據做好的紙樣來排版，做到合理省料，靈活安排。

sentences.english: Now the makeup of books by printing houses has long been changed from vertical linage to horizontal linage .
sentences.chinese: 現在出版社排版書的方式早已從原來的豎排改成橫排。

sentences.english: The majority of the text used in Chinese composition consists of Han characters (hanzi).
sentences.chinese: 中文排版主要使用的文字爲漢字。

sentences.english: This process is known as a reflow.
sentences.chinese: 這個過程被稱作重排版。

sentences.english: It’s important to use formatting to help with readability. That means
sentences.chinese: 利用排版來增加易讀性也很重要。

definition: (publishing) (abbr. for 美術編輯|美术编辑[mei3 shu4 bian1 ji2]) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
editor in charge (abbr. for 責任編輯|责任编辑[ze2 ren4 bian1 ji2])
(publishing) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
